Post-Match Reflections: Dallas, last season's Western Conference champions, had gone 1-5 since losing Luka Doncic to a calf strain on Christmas Day. Still without the Slovenian star, they announced on Monday that Kyrie Irving would be sidelined for some time with a lower back sprain.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Anthony Davis scored 21 points and pulled down 12 rebounds for the Lakers and LeBron James added 18 points, 10 boards and eight assists.
Others: P.J. Washington scored 22 points, Spencer Dinwiddie added 19 and Klay Thompson chipped in 13 for Dallas, who bumped the Lakers from fifth place in the Western Conference.The game was held at the American Airlines Center in Dallas, Texas.
